thread.section_title: MAXBACK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MAXBACK | www.maxback.com | 2 of 49
thread.title: S.

author: S.
title: S.
text: The company gives thorough details on how to sell back items and gives instructions on how to clear any equipment adequately so it will not interfere in the process of MaxBack processing any items. The buyback was adequate and fair. They paid the full price of the estimate I gave. Received payment very quickly after they notified me that I had forgotten to unlink the phone on the cloud. Would recommend to anyone who doesn't want to throw away electronics. Thanks for a great first experience, MaxBack, and thanks for giving me the opportunity to recycle electronic items.
